Compress location lookup using gzip.

This commit introduces optional compression of the location lookups. Some code cleanup for elements shared between lookup and uploading.

Closes #446.

Add number of GPS satellites to the main screen.

Block Adelaide Metro Public WiFi.

First reported by @micolous. Closes #458.
Decided to use BSSID instead of SSID due to a relatively common name in the SSID field (```PublicWiFi```).
